name: Spring Valley: Farm Adventures
description:
Find a scenic cove on the banks of a mountain lake where everyone’s waiting for you! Play the lead role in your very own fairy adventure: start a family and make friends, create a farm in your own style and breathe new life into the renowned mansion of family thrill-seekers - the Foggs.

Kick back on your idyllic family farm, recharge your batteries then set off on exciting and fun adventure in a wild world full of romance and moving moments! Great friends, love, farm & animals - lush landscapes will unroll before your eyes, along with the stories of the local folk and your family secrets.

- Travel, build, cultivate, solve a farm puzzle and find solid friends in the incomparable world of Spring Valley - be what a brave hero can be!
- Build the greatest village and farm! Harvest crops, nurture your animals, produce goods for folk in the city and for expeditions, and discover new recipes. Farm building will teach you how to work hard and then enjoy the result!
- Uncover and unravel the mystery and secrets hidden in the family mansion and make it a magnificent home with a lush garden and an intriguing ambience. This is truly yours fairy town!
- Meet all the characters of the land adventure! Brave Sid and his cat Captain Meatball, pretty Madeline, kind soul Matthew, and his charismatic sister Tiffany can’t wait for you to get to town!
- Make friends with characters in the game. Not everything is farm related! Go on dates or lend them a hand to get gifts and more of the fun story!
- Go on a journey with your new friends, discover unique and wild nooks of the forest village! Solve addicting puzzles on expeditions, fix up buildings that hide new secrets and collect rare resources!

Spring Valley belongs to the category of relaxing and fun farm RPG casual games. Enjoy idyllic family farming, collect mobile harvest, build connections and fall in love. Live life to its fullest in a dreamy fairy village.

Looking for exciting house farming games? Here you go, uncle’s Mansion is yours!

Spring Valley is not simply about building a farm, it’s so much more:

Grow food: have your own vegetables and fruits ready every day
Get resources: mine stone and chop wood to complete all tasks
Produce goods: bake fresh bread, milks cows and collect eggs
Fix up the mansion: room by room you can make it a house of your dream!
Explore wild lands: take a friend and go into a wild
Fulfil orders: rebuild the kitchen, have a drink or take a nap
Build relationships: who said there is no place for love in farming adventure games? Find the one and start a family!

We use the best elements of new farm games to make your experience fun and exciting. Enter the valley now to explore a new world next to the mountain lake.
